subject: p18487334
History: Shortness of breath and chest pain, assess for cardiomegaly or edema.
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest were provided demonstrating midline sternotomy wires and a dual-lead pacer which appear unchanged with lead extending into the region of the right atrium and right ventricle. Lungs are clear without signs of pneumonia or edema. No effusion or pneumothorax. Cardiomediastinal silhouette appears normal. The imaged bony structures are intact.
Impression: No acute findings in the chest.
